title: Getting Started with Next.js
content:
# Getting Started with Next.js

Next.js is a powerful React framework that makes building web applications a breeze. Here's why you should consider using it:

## Key Features

1. Server-side rendering
2. Static site generation
3. API routes
4. File-system based routing

## Getting Started

To create a new Next.js project, simply run:

```bash
npx create-next-app@latest
```
